#summary The <author> Tag

= Introduction =

The `<author>` tag identifies the person who created this Nerdcules character sheet.


= Details =

Every Nerdcules character sheet must have exactly one `<author>` tag, which must appear inside the [TagHead <head>] tag. The `<author>` tag is fifth in sequence, appearing after the [TagCopyright <copyright>] tag. The value of this tag should be your real name or monicker, or two or more names or monickers for a collaboration.

== Example ==

Please see the [TagHead <head>] tag for an example.
